power.title: Arcane Transport
power.fluff: You extend your magic to include a nearby friend as you step through an unseen, arcane corridor
power.section: Trigger: You teleport using a Swordmage power
true Effect: You teleport the target to a space adjacent to the space you teleport to.

power.title: Channeling Shield
power.fluff: You throw up a temporary shield to absorb some of the power of a foe's attack
power.section: Trigger: An attack hits you or an ally within 10 squares of you

section.name: Target:
section.target: the ally hit by the triggering attack

power.section: true Effect: The target gains resist all against the triggering attack equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Level 11: Equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Level 21: Equal to 7 + your Constitution modifier.

true 1 Arcane Aegis: If the attacking creature was marked by your arcane aegis, the target gains a bonus to the first damage roll it makes before the end of its next turn. The bonus equals 1 + one-half your Strength modifier.

power.title: Dimensional Warp
power.fluff: You reach out with arcane power, and two of your nearby allies suddenly wink out and reappear in each other's places

section.name: Target:
section.target: you and one ally in the burst, or two allies in the burst; both targets must occupy the same size space

power.section: true Effect: Each target taleports into the other's space.

power.title: Eldritch Speed
power.fluff: Eldritch power flows in your blood, and when battle is joined, that power speeds you on
power.section: Trigger: You are about to roll initiative
true Effect:You gain the following two benefits:
You gain a +5 power bonus to the triggering initiative roll.
true During the first round of combat (and during the surprise round, if you are allowed to act during that round), you can take an extra move action.

power.title: Elemental Aegis
power.fluff: You raise an aegis in your ally's defense, infusing the shield with energy that helps defend against certain elemental attacks
power.section: Trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you is attacked by an enemy marked by you
true Effect: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
true The target gainst resist against the chosen damage type equal to 4 + your Constitution modifier until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.
true 1 Level 11: Equal to 8 + your Constitution modifier.
true 1 Level 21: Equal to 12 + your Constition modifier.

power.title: Fear no Elements
power.fluff: The elements of the universe are yours to command, and they do not easily damage you
power.section: true Effect: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
true Until the end of the encounter, you gain resist against the chosen damage type equal to one-third your level + your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Ghost Step Stance
power.fluff: Like a ghost, you glide unharmed through the battlefield
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Ghost Step stance.
true Until the stance ends, whenever you shift, you can shift 1 additional square.
true You also have a +2 power bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by your movement.

power.title: Host of Shields
power.fluff: Your weapon produces a few small, glowing shields that orbit your body and ward off blows
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Host of Shields stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex.

power.title: Price of Lethargy
power.fluff: Your attacks punish those who cannot escape your reach
power.section: true Effect: You enter the Price of Lethargy stance.
true Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against slowed or dazed targets, or a +3 power bonus to damage rolls against immobilized or unconscious targets.

power.title: Recuperating Warding
power.fluff: You focus your warding inward to bolster yourself
power.section: true Effect: You make a saving throw against an effect that a save can end.

power.title: Spellblade's Gift
power.fluff: A ring of magical energy washes out from you, clinging to your allies' weapons

section.name: Target:
section.target: each weapon you or an ally is wielding in the burst

power.section: true Effect: Choose one of: fire, cold, lightning, thunder, or force.
true Until the end of your next turn, attacks made with the target weapons deals damage of the chosen type.

true If an attack does not have the correspond keyword, it gains it. If the attack deals untyped damage or causes untyped ongoing damage, the damage type becomes the chosen damage.If an attack already has a damage type, the type becomes the chosen type in addition to the type(s) it already has.
true 1 Sustain Minor: The effect persist until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Ward of Brilliance
power.fluff: A brilliant flash of light shields you, possibly blinding your foe
power.section: Trigger: An enemy marked by you hits you with a melee attack
true Effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack, and a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of the triggering creature's next turn.
true If the triggering attack hits you despite this bonus, after the attack has been resolved, the attacking enemy is blinded until the start of its next turn.
